articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Britain is tossing aside its last green trump card
articles.description: Rishi Sunak is shifting into election mode. Ahead of a likely national poll next year, the British prime minister is considering watering down the country’s targets for electric vehicles and energy efficiency. The move may play well with some voters, and Sunak’s own right-wing fringe. The loser is not only the UK’s net-zero credibility, but its long-term economic health.
articles.content: LONDON, Sept 20 (Reuters Breakingviews) - Rishi Sunak is shifting into election mode. Ahead of a likely national poll next year, the British prime minister is considering watering down the country’s targets for electric vehicles and energy efficiency... [3750 chars]

articles.title: Opinion: This generation needs The Talking Heads as much as their parents did
articles.description: A24’s newly restored 40th anniversary print of The Talking Heads’ legendary concert film “Stop Making Sense” is an opportunity for reappraisal, writes Noah Berlatsky. Talking Heads’ lyrics, full of oddity and satire, rebuked the Reagan era, which may resonate with today’s generations at odds with the Trump era.
